subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Kentucky state racing regulators are preparing to impose new restrictions this month on the use of whips in harness racing. Changes could follow at thoroughbred meets after a Kentucky track finishes testing different types of whips.
snippet: Kentucky state racing regulators are preparing to impose new restrictions this month on the use of whips in harness racing. Changes could follow at thoroughbred meets after a Kentucky track finishes testing different types of whips.
